name: Push n' Escape
description:
How to play:

Push n' Escape is a simple action game.

Press "X" or "C" to start the game.

Use "Arrow Keys" to move your character.

Push back moving walls to go downstairs.

Try your best to go as deep as you can!

Created by:

John Kang (@s90105JohnKang): Design, Code

Yoyolee: Art, Music
